author: donelsongrahamberger
title: The Million ADA Homepage
description: To encourage people to come to the Cardano space we need to first shows off its unique technologies. Second we need a large community event.

assessments.note:
I do not see how this proposal will effectively increase the number of proposals, but the owner of the page will own 500 000 ADA. 

I can not be UNBIASED in this case. This is a very bad proposal. 

Also, having this webpage is one thing, and what about 

"how to buy pixels?" 
"does it increase more NFT market or number of proposals?"

It's not clear how a website like this would attract proposers to Project Catalyst. I do not agree with the claim "This project can only exist in the Cardano ecosystem, because of its cheap transactions, multi-asset transactions, and secure contracts". On the other hand, If this goes viral it could indeed create brand awareness, but it looks a bit like gambling to me, since if that does not happen, there will be almost no return for cardano and catalyst.

Beg your pardon if I've not understood. However, what is the value of buying a pixel in order to help someone with just a half of the value of what they've bought? Would not be easier and more helpful if I just choose a charity and give my money to them? 
Other than that, I was wondering if it would get viral or would generate interest because some data shows that only individuals in US gave, in 2019, more than $300bi to charity, thus 500K ADA (assuming ADA $2) ~ $1M. 
And, it seems to be just a one shoot thing.
low info provided, but I assume he would die for it, since he would receive 500 000 ada by time :)
It is not clear how the project will be markets and how the proposer expects to manage this process or if they have the experience.

The experience presented is relevant to the project but there are IMO some critical issues.
* Some portions of the budget seems not very balanced (e.s. 10k$ for hosting)
* The main selling point, charity donations, are not very well defined and there's some risk of not actually adhering to promises, given the extreme centralization of power (tokens and value ) in the hands of just one person. I.e. there's no guarantee that the proposer won't run away with the money once the project is successful, possibly hurting the image of cardano
* one of the proposal is to use 500k$ worth of ADA to recoup losses, maintain the project and pay off student debts. Apart from the student debts part, which may be ok provided it is the outcome of a public vote, why should there be losses or additional resources needed outside of the budget? What does that cover then?
* The conversion between ADA and $ is not defined. What would happen if that drastically changes?

It's not specified in the proposal how it is going to work, exactly. I've seen a brief explanation in the commentaries about the 'color change', however, I would like that this was more explicit in the proposal itself. 
Besides, the roadmap could be more explicit, giving dates and milestones, allowing us to follow the results.
Moreover, it's not explained if we're going to wait to sell all the 1Mi ADA or whether will be a deadline to donation, or how everything is actually going to work. If you do not sell all pixels, what will happen?

I did not find any key metrics. Giving to charity would increase only the brand of Cardano, and that is not the point. 

EDIT he provided an explanation and ways how to count website visitors, and argued that there is no (or it is hard) to find a tool to measure how a marketing campaign affects the number of proposers. Well, I gave him a suggestion, let's see.
How does this bring proposers to Porject Catalyst. This seems like the proposer wants 30,000 to enable themselves to make 500,000 personal profit.

The budget is partitioned and there is a plan, even though a timeline and success metrics are not defined, making assessing the success or failure of the project a bit hard, especially since there's no obvious way of determining impact of it on project catalyst (there are however some proposals for doing that in the comments that seems ok)

It's missing a more detailed roadmap, metrics and KPI.
It's not clear how we gonna measure the amount of people outside from the project that came because of your platform, for example.

solution: The Million ADA Homepage will be a community art piece that will display Cardano's unique technologies while raising money for charity.
experience: I am currently in the Plutus Pioneer Program, I have relevant experience in web design, and back end engineering.
